text: Moonlight and Valentino is a comedy and drama movie from 1995. Elizabeth Perkins plays Rebecca. Whoopi Goldberg plays Sylvie. Kathleen Turner plays Alberta. Gwyneth Paltrow plays Lucy. This movie got mostly bad reviews from critics.
